gobblin.metrics.context.filter

Interface ContextFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllContextFilter

    public interface ContextFilter
    Filter for selecting MetricContexts to report by a ContextAwareReporter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<MetricContext> getMatchingContexts()
      Get all MetricContexts in the MetricContext tree that should be reported.
      boolean matches(MetricContext metricContext)
      Whether the input MetricContext should be reported.
      boolean shouldReplaceByParent(InnerMetricContext removedMetricContext)
      This method is called by a ContextAwareReporter when a MetricContext that it used to report is cleaned.

    • Method Detail

      • getMatchingContexts

        Set<MetricContext> getMatchingContexts()
        Get all MetricContexts in the MetricContext tree that should be reported.
        Returns:
        Set of MetricContexts that should be reported.

      • matches

        boolean matches(MetricContext metricContext)
        Whether the input MetricContext should be reported.
        Parameters:
        metricContext - MetricContext to check.
        Returns:
        true if the input MetricContext should be reported.

      • shouldReplaceByParent

        boolean shouldReplaceByParent(InnerMetricContext removedMetricContext)
        This method is called by a ContextAwareReporter when a MetricContext that it used to report is cleaned. Every cleaned MetricContext is a leaf of the tree. In some circumstances, after removing the MetricContext it is necessary to start reporting the parent (for example, if we are reporting leaves, and the parent is a new leaf). This method is called to determine if the ContextAwareReporter should start reporting the parent of the input InnerMetricContext.
        Parameters:
        removedMetricContext - InnerMetricContext backing up the newly removed MetricContext.
        Returns:
        true if the parent of the removed MetricContext should be reported.
